topicSummary: An assessment should be carried out on all women requesting contraception to identify any relevant medical conditions or medication

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Contraception - assessment: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Topic updated in line with the Faculty of Sexual and Reproductive Healthcare (FSRH) guidelines Overweight, Obesity and Contraception FSRH, 2019.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Added information about fetal malformations and effectiveness of hormonal contraceptives as an effect of topiramate.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in August 2016 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of the topic. Minor structural changes have been made.
